title: Does exactly what it should
comment: This appears to be a well-designed app. Some people are complaining that it doesn't appear on the lock screen. While it's true that it doesn't have built-in lockscreen capability, it works fine with Widget Locker. I think it's unreasonable to give a poor review of an app for not doing something it doesn't claim to do. The sometimes insane expectations of Android users, even for free apps, are one reason I don't develop Android apps.   Maybe the developer can just place a note in the top of his description saying you need a widget-capable lockscreen app for this to appear on your lockscreen. In any case, this is a good app and I appreciate having it.
